message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split.  It's important we reach a deal soon, as the value is decreasing with every round!
Let's meet in the middle of our previous offers. This is a good compromise.
Alice, we're running out of time and the pot is shrinking. This is my final offer, let's be reasonable and close this deal.
I'll meet you closer to your offer, but I need a bit more. This is my best compromise.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair deal. Take it or leave it.
